TEXT.TITLE: <CANADIAN SATELLITE COMMUNICATIONS> SIX MTHS NET
TEXT.BODY: Period ended February 28 Oper shr profit six cts vs loss 15 cts Oper profit 474,000 vs loss 1,175,000 Revs 17,946,000 vs 9,271,000 Note: Current shr and net exclude tax gain of 513,000 dlrs or five cts share full name <Canadian Satellite Communications Inc> Reuter
